entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story who is trying to get closer to Voldemort. He is mentioned as being close to his goal but is thwarted by Malfoy.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who has run out of earshot with Hermione while searching for the diadem.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another friend of Harry's who has run out of earshot with Ron while searching for the diadem.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a character in the story who is being referred to by Harry. He is mentioned as someone that Harry and his friends are trying to get closer to.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is one of Voldemort's followers who is speaking with Harry. He is described as being enormous but has a surprisingly soft voice.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is another follower of Voldemort who is thwarting Harry's plans to get closer to him.

entities.name: diadem
entities.description: The diadem is an object that Ron and Hermione are searching for. It is mentioned as something that they have run out of earshot to find.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is another name for Harry, the main character of the story.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to get closer to Voldemort.
Ron and Hermione are searching for the diadem together.
Crabbe is a follower of Voldemort.
Malfoy is also a follower of Voldemort.
